blur_detection.description: The receipt image is generally sharp with clear, readable text throughout the document.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action needed as the text clarity is sufficient for OCR processing.

contrast_assessment.description: Strong black text on white background provides excellent contrast for text recognition.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: No improvement needed for contrast as it is already optimal for OCR processing.

glare_identification.description: No significant glare or reflections are present that would obscure text information.
glare_identification.recommendation: No action needed regarding glare management.

water_stains.description: No water damage, staining, or discoloration is visible on the receipt.
water_stains.recommendation: No remediation needed for water damage.

tears_or_folds.description: Minor creasing visible at the top of the receipt, but no significant impact on text legibility.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: No action needed as the minor creasing doesn't affect readability.

cut_off_detection.description: The receipt appears to be fully captured with no important information cut off at the edges.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: Continue to ensure full document capture in future scans.

missing_sections.description: All standard receipt sections appear to be present including header, line items, subtotals, and payment information.
missing_sections.recommendation: No action needed as the receipt content is complete.

obstructions.description: No fingers, shadows, or other objects are obstructing the receipt content.
obstructions.recommendation: Continue to ensure clear, obstruction-free captures.
